abstract: Carl C. Icahn’s battle to gain control of Lions Gate, the movie and TV studio, is like a movie with plenty of plot twists but little character development and motivation.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn’s battle to gain control of Lions Gate, the movie and TV studio, is like a movie with plenty of plot twists but little character development and motivation.
lead_paragraph: The battle between Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment invites comparison with the studio’s movies. Is it a slasher movie akin to “Saw”? An action film along the lines of “Kick-Ass”? Or perhaps it is something new, a cold and calculating thriller showing the perils of shareholder activism.

headline.main: Icahn-Lions Gate Epic: No Hollywood Ending
